adHeader: HONEY BEEKEEPER NEED PLACE TO KEEP BEES
adDetails: HONEY BEEKEEPER NEED PLACE TO KEEP BEES (west marin) Hi my name is Bill Chop, I am a local beekeeper. Looking for a place for my bees. Big ranches, wilderness, or foothills, preserved properties may be considered on organic honey barter bases. Bee hives can be placed along the fence. Bees are very beneficial to the environment, and our agriculture depends on it. THANK YOU Call Bill show contact info cell SAVE THE BEES Bee, Bees, yard, location, orchard, farm, property, vacant land, pollination, honey, ranch
